sections.title: Supervisor evaluation
sections.description: Please answer a few questions regarding your supervisor.

questions.question: How likely would you recommend your supervisor to a colleague?
questions.formattedQuestion: 1. How likely would you recommend your supervisor to a colleague?

questions.question: How often is your supervisor late to work?
questions.formattedQuestion: 2. How often is your supervisor late to work?

questions.question: Please elaborate on how your supervisor can improve.
questions.formattedQuestion: 4. Please elaborate on how your supervisor can improve.
